text: Wọ́n yóò mú àwáwí wá fun yín nígbà tí ẹ bá darí dé bá wọn. Sọ pé: "Ẹ má ṣe mú àwáwí wá; a ò níí gbà yín gbọ́. Allāhu kúkú ti sọ àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ yín fún wa. Allāhu àti Òjíṣẹ́ Rẹ̀ yó sì rí iṣẹ́ (ọwọ́) yín. Lẹ́yìn náà, A óò da yín padà sí ọ̀dọ̀ Onímọ̀-ìkọ̀kọ̀ àti gban̄gba. Nígbà náà, Ó máa fun yín ní ìró ohun tí ẹ̀ ń ṣe níṣẹ́
